channel.title: Tech on Cache Valley Communities
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on Cache Valley Communities

item.title: Cache Tech Community Meetup - Feburuary 2025
item.description: Join us on Feb 22, 2025, at 1:30 PM (MST) at Bridgerland Technical College for a tech meetup focused on programming and networking. The event features an open discussion on tech careers and a hands-on session where attendees will build a chat application in Go. Open to all skill levels—bring your laptop and curiosity!

item.title: Cache Tech Community Meetup - January 2025
item.description: Join us on Jan 25, 2025, at 1:30 PM (MST) at Logan Library for a tech meetup! The event features an open discussion on tech careers and a deep dive into mobile forensics, including an iPhone forensic demo. Open to all skill levels—come learn and connect!
